name: Structures de quadrilatères
description: Tried to recreate Molnars Structures de quadrilatères, by using a grid and putting color in a math.random function.

name: Structures de quadrilatères Noise
description: Making a variation from the previous one by adding noise to create these ring tunnels creating a spacey look.

name: Structures de quadrilatères Noise 2
description: Changing the colors and adding an animation so it moves by 10fps. Also adding a noise on top of the grid just to experiment and see what is possible with the noise.
